skills.name: OAuth 2.0 Basics
skills.pattern: Delegated authorization, access tokens, scopes

skills.name: OAuth vs OIDC
skills.pattern: OAuth: authorization, OIDC: authentication + identity

skills.name: Roles
skills.pattern: Resource owner, client, authorization server, resource server

skills.name: Authorization Code
skills.pattern: Redirect to auth, get code, exchange for token

skills.name: PKCE
skills.pattern: code_verifier + code_challenge, prevents interception

skills.name: Client Credentials
skills.pattern: No user, client authenticates directly, service accounts

skills.name: Device Flow
skills.pattern: Display code, user authorizes on another device

skills.name: Implicit Flow
skills.pattern: DEPRECATED: token in URL fragment, use PKCE instead

skills.name: Access Tokens
skills.pattern: Short-lived, Bearer token, scope-limited, JWT or opaque

skills.name: Refresh Tokens
skills.pattern: Long-lived, exchange for new access token, rotate

skills.name: ID Tokens
skills.pattern: JWT with user info, sub, email, name claims

skills.name: OIDC Discovery
skills.pattern: /.well-known/openid-configuration, endpoints, keys

skills.name: UserInfo Endpoint
skills.pattern: GET /userinfo with access token, profile claims

skills.name: Standard Scopes
skills.pattern: openid, profile, email, address, phone

skills.name: Claims
skills.pattern: sub (subject), iss (issuer), aud (audience), exp, iat

skills.name: State Parameter
skills.pattern: Random state, verify on callback, prevent attacks

skills.name: Nonce
skills.pattern: Random nonce in request, verify in ID token

skills.name: Token Storage
skills.pattern: HttpOnly cookies, not localStorage, BFF pattern

skills.name: Token Validation
skills.pattern: Signature, expiry, issuer, audience, use JWKS

skills.name: Passport.js
skills.pattern: passport-oauth2, passport-google-oauth20, strategies

skills.name: NextAuth.js
skills.pattern: Built-in providers, callbacks, JWT/database sessions

skills.name: Auth0
skills.pattern: Universal Login, SDKs, Rules, Actions, MFA

skills.name: Keycloak
skills.pattern: Self-hosted, realms, clients, identity federation

skills.name: Social Login
skills.pattern: Google, GitHub, Facebook, Apple, Microsoft

skills.name: Enterprise SSO
skills.pattern: SAML, Okta, Azure AD, federation

skills.name: Token Exchange
skills.pattern: RFC 8693, delegation, impersonation

skills.name: Pushed Authorization
skills.pattern: Push request object first, get request_uri

skills.name: DPoP
skills.pattern: Bind token to key pair, prevent token theft

skills.name: API Authorization
skills.pattern: Bearer token validation, scope checking, rate limits

skills.name: OAuth Testing
skills.pattern: Mock IdP, test tokens, integration tests, security scan
